findings.title: The information leakage of developers
findings.description: The "main.jsbundle" file has leaked information about the developers.

findings.title: Verify Phrase issue
findings.description: Only one phrase was validated, not all the phrases.

findings.title: App Transport Security AllowsArbitraryLoads is allowed
findings.description: App Transport Security restrictions are disabled for all network connections, allowing unsecured HTTP connections and disabling extended security checks like requiring a minimum Transport Layer Security (TLS) protocol version.
